def_cn: (有自己特定的需求、目标顾客和产品的)小众市场，缝隙市场，利基市场;商机
def_en: A niche in the market is a specific area of marketing which has its own particular requirements, customers, and products.

def_cn: (营销)针对特定客户群的，细分的;专营的
def_en: Niche marketing is the practice of dividing the market into specialized areas for which particular products are made. A niche market is one of these specialized areas.

def_cn: 壁龛;(山体或悬崖上的)凹洞
def_en: A niche is a hollow area in a wall which has been made to hold a statue, or a natural hollow part in a hill or cliff.

def_cn: 称心的工作;合适的活动
def_en: Your niche is the job or activity which is exactly suitable for you.

def_cn: 为自己创造一个稳固的位置
def_en: If you carve a niche for yourself, you organize your work to create a secure position.
